channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Bin bags in tree, 28th March
item.description:
Ripped bin bags all torn up in tree.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Chepstow House Princess Elizabeth Way, Cheltenham

item.title: Whole road surface gone, 28th March
item.description:
Huge chunks of the road surface are now missing over around 50 yards of the road. Not so much of a pothole, as opposed to half road / half hole. Urgent resurfacing clearly required.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 260 Priors Road, Prestbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked gullies in Montpellier Gardens, 28th March
item.description:
At least 2 blocked gullies, on path running across gardens towards stature of William IV. These have been blocked for a VERY long time, and cause water to run down path along edge of gardens. Need cleaning out - ALL gullies in gardens need cleaning, not just the two shown in the attached photos.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 8 Glensanda Court Montpellier Spa Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: More potholes on the bad bend, 27th March
item.description:
You have just filled in the very deep pothole here but ignored the others around it! Surely it would be a good idea to fix them all at the same time? Please fix asap.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 1 Tredington Park, Tredington

item.title: No consideration, 27th March
item.description:
Can anyone tell me if kind of parking is illegal ? I am sick of finding it hard to get off my driveway because people living 22 think this is good parking

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 7 Boleyn Close, Churchdown
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Several craters the size of the moon appearing!, 27th March
item.description:
This is the 3rd time since 2018 that these pot holes have reappeared Might actually be time to redo the whole roundabout as patching them doesn’t seem to work As they are most likely above the min/max size of a pot hole as per the procedure the council has and have been present for 2, coming into their third week, it’s good to see the inspectors are out in force regularly checking the roads and marking holes of concern to be fixed within the required SLAs…. Ooooor not!!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 4 Barnett Way, Barnwood
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Various potholes, 27th March
item.description:
The roundabout has a number of deep potholes and a section where the road has completely broken up. This section could trap a motor bike or cyclist wheel causing the rider to fall onto a busy roundabout.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 142 Fairview Road, Cheltenham

item.title: 3 x potholes, 26th March
item.description:
There are 3 x potholes in carriageway opposite the entrance to Nuffield Hospital. The one nearest the curb is a collapse from a fix a few years ago. The 2 closer to the central line are new potholes. ///taxi.select.hooks
